comments: 496 is the third perfect number A000396(3) and 31 is the third Mersenne prime A000668(3). For the structure of this sequence and its representation in base 2, see A135653. - _Omar E. Pol_, Mar 03 2008
links: Index entries for sequences related to divisors of numbers
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: An incorrect g.f. was deleted by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 16 2009
